LanguageData.SummonDeathPall.label: DeathPall
LanguageData.SummonDeathPall.description: Have a ritual to get the area covered by the gray mist. \n\nA corpse-gray cloud composed of microscopic self-powered archites created by some unknown superintelligence. When they land on dead flesh, they enter the body and reanimate it to create a shambling imitation of life.
LanguageData.SummonDeathPall.outcomeDescription: At the current ritual quality, the DeathPall will last for {0}.
